job_tasks.phrase: translate these new technologies into a user-friendly and effective product
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of taking new technologies (in this case, generative AI) and building them into a functional product for end-users.

job_tasks.phrase: work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members to quickly develop prototypes
job_tasks.justification: This highlights collaborative software development and the creation of prototypes, which is a key aspect of building new products.

job_tasks.phrase: be willing to accept less elegant or scalable solutions for rapid, testable delivery
job_tasks.justification: This points to a pragmatic approach in software development, prioritizing speed and testability over immediate perfection, a common practice in agile environments.
This describes the iterative nature of software development, where feedback is used to refine and enhance the product over time.
This explicitly mentions core software engineering tasks related to building the server-side logic and interfaces of an application.

job_tasks.phrase: building a new product from scratch
job_tasks.justification: This is a fundamental software development task, involving the creation of a product from its initial stages.
This refers to the ongoing maintenance and enhancement of software products, a standard software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: leverage new technologies like generative AI and conversational agents
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the use and application of generative AI technologies, which falls under the specialization of AI/ML model development and application.

job_tasks.phrase: support healthcare providers in their logistical processes
job_tasks.justification: This describes the business problem the product aims to solve, indicating a need to understand the business context.

job_tasks.phrase: support healthcare workers with logistical challenges
job_tasks.justification: Similar to the above, this highlights the business domain and the need to understand the challenges faced by users.

job_tasks.phrase: apply these advanced technologies across all of our products
job_tasks.justification: This suggests a strategic vision for applying AI/ML technologies within the broader business context.

soft_skills.phrase: willingness to learn and implement new technologies
soft_skills.justification: This directly expresses the need for a candidate who is open to acquiring and applying new technical knowledge.
This explicitly calls out the need for problem-solving abilities, a key soft skill in technical roles.

soft_skills.phrase: I truly am an entrepreneur in our own market group. Initiatives are appreciated and we are all trusted with picking it up and to actually carrying it out together.
soft_skills.justification: This quote emphasizes an entrepreneurial spirit, taking initiative, and ownership, which aligns with innovation and ownership.
This highlights the importance of teamwork and working effectively with others.

soft_skills.phrase: work together with our UX designer/researcher, front-end developer, and other team members
soft_skills.justification: This further emphasizes collaboration with a diverse set of team members.

soft_skills.phrase: Your team is a multidisciplinary product team
soft_skills.justification: This indicates that the role involves working within a team composed of individuals with different specializations, requiring collaboration.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on traditional software development tasks (building products, prototypes, backend/API development, iterative improvement) which fall under Macro-Category A. While it mentions leveraging generative AI and conversational agents (Macro-Category B), the core responsibilities and emphasis are on integrating these technologies into a product rather than deep model development or specialization in GenAI techniques like prompt engineering or RAG. The role is primarily a software engineering position that uses AI as a component of the product, fitting the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines software development responsibilities and mentions the use of generative AI. The distinction between core software engineering and AI specialization is evident, allowing for a confident profile assignment. However, it doesn't go into deep technical detail about the AI aspects, which prevents a perfect score.
